data.eml:eml: A new acuariid species (Spirurida, Acuariidae) and other nematodes from Hydromys (Muridae, Hydromyinae) from Papua, Indonesia and Papua New Guinea

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Smales, Lesley R. (2006): A new acuariid species (Spirurida, Acuariidae) and other nematodes from Hydromys (Muridae, Hydromyinae) from Papua, Indonesia and Papua New Guinea. Zootaxa 1110: 27-37, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.171528
